category.name: Mail
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mail_server_authentication_activated
preference.preference_description: Defines if the Mail sent from Teamcenter needs to be Authenticated. Valid Values: * true: The authentication will be performed while sending an email. An admin will need to update Mail_server_authentication_id, Mail_server_connection_security, Mail_server_authentication_passwd_location and Mail_server_ssl_protocol if authentication is true. * false: The email will be sent without authentication. An admin may need to update the Mail_server_port if authentication is false. This is the default value.
